# pointOfInterestFilter

**Instance Property**

A filter to use to include or exclude point-of-interest categories.

## Declaration

```swift
get pointOfInterestFilter(): PointOfInterestFilter | null;
set pointOfInterestFilter(value: PointOfInterestFilter | null);
```

## Discussion

If you provide a [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/PointOfInterestFilter] and set [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Search/includePointsOfInterest] to `false`, the filter takes precedence and MapKit JS ignores the Boolean.
